description: Acne is a skin condition where pores become clogged with dead skin and sebum leading to breakouts
causes: Hormones; Bacteria (Cutibacterium acnes); Excess sebum production; Poor skincare; Stress
symptoms: Pimples; Blackheads; Whiteheads; Cysts; Redness; Scarring
severity_levels: Mild - few pimples; Moderate - multiple pimples; Severe - deep cysts; Cystic - painful nodules
treatment_approach: Use exfoliants to unclog pores; Apply antibacterial products; Reduce oil production; Keep skin clean twice daily
key_ingredients: Salicylic Acid; Benzoyl Peroxide; Azelaic Acid; Niacinamide
prevention_tips: Keep skin clean; Don't touch face; Change pillowcase every 2 days; Manage stress; Avoid heavy makeup

description: Enlarged pores are usually caused by excess oil production or genetics and can trap dirt and bacteria
causes: Genetics; Excess sebum; Sun damage; Age; Dehydration
symptoms: Visibly enlarged pores; Prone to blackheads; Rough texture; Oily appearance
severity_levels: Small - barely visible; Medium - noticeable; Large - very prominent
treatment_approach: Use pore-minimizing serums; Exfoliate regularly; Control oil; Use clay masks
prevention_tips: Use sunscreen daily; Keep skin hydrated; Exfoliate 2-3x weekly; Manage oil production

description: Dark spots are areas of hyperpigmentation caused by excess melanin production
causes: Sun exposure; Hormonal changes; Acne scars; Aging; Inflammation
symptoms: Uneven tone; Brown or black patches; Dullness; Pigmented scars
severity_levels: Mild - light discoloration; Moderate - visible spots; Severe - deep pigmentation
treatment_approach: Use brightening serums; Apply sunscreen; Exfoliate gently; Use chemical peels
key_ingredients: Vitamin C; Niacinamide; Kojic Acid; Alpha Arbutin; Retinol
prevention_tips: Always wear sunscreen; Avoid picking pimples; Use antioxidants; Maintain gentle exfoliation

description: Blackheads are open comedones caused by clogged pores filled with sebum and dead cells that oxidize
causes: Excess oil; Poor cleansing; Dead skin buildup; Heavy makeup; Humidity
symptoms: Visible black dots on nose or chin; Rough skin texture; Oily appearance
severity_levels: Mild - few small dots; Moderate - visible clusters; Severe - widespread clogging
treatment_approach: Use exfoliating acids; Pore strips; Gentle cleansing; Avoid pore-blocking products
prevention_tips: Wash face twice daily; Avoid heavy creams; Exfoliate regularly; Keep pores clean

description: Wrinkles are fine lines or folds in the skin caused by loss of elasticity and collagen with age
causes: Aging; Sun damage; Smoking; Dehydration; Repetitive expressions
symptoms: Fine lines; Sagging; Dry texture; Creases around eyes and mouth
severity_levels: Mild - faint lines; Moderate - visible lines; Severe - deep folds
treatment_approach: Use anti-aging serums; Moisturize daily; Protect from UV; Stimulate collagen
key_ingredients: Retinol; Peptides; Hyaluronic Acid; Vitamin E; Collagen
prevention_tips: Use SPF daily; Stay hydrated; Sleep well; Avoid smoking

description: Clogged pores occur when oil and debris block hair follicles leading to dull skin and breakouts
causes: Excess sebum; Sweat; Makeup residue; Pollution; Poor cleansing
symptoms: Dullness; Tiny bumps; Blackheads; Whiteheads; Congested skin
severity_levels: Mild - few blocked pores; Moderate - multiple clogged areas; Severe - inflammation
treatment_approach: Double cleanse; Exfoliate 2-3 times a week; Use clay masks
key_ingredients: Salicylic Acid; Glycolic Acid; Clay; Niacinamide
prevention_tips: Remove makeup daily; Avoid comedogenic products; Keep tools clean

description: Oily skin produces excess sebum that can clog pores and lead to acne
symptoms: Shiny T-zone; Enlarged pores; Frequent breakouts; Makeup melts easily
severity_levels: Mild - light shine; Moderate - visible oil; Severe - greasy appearance
treatment_approach: Use oil-control products; Light moisturizers; Mattifying serums
key_ingredients: Niacinamide; Zinc PCA; Clay; Green Tea Extract
prevention_tips: Use blotting paper; Avoid heavy creams; Use gel-based products

description: Uneven skin texture feels rough or bumpy due to buildup of dead cells or enlarged pores
causes: Dehydration; Dead skin buildup; Sun damage; Acne scars
severity_levels: Mild - slight roughness; Moderate - visible texture; Severe - thickened areas
treatment_approach: Exfoliate regularly; Use retinoids; Moisturize consistently
prevention_tips: Keep skin hydrated; Avoid harsh scrubs; Apply sunscreen

description: Post-acne scars form after inflammation damages skin tissue
causes: Severe acne; Picking pimples; Delayed healing
symptoms: Depressed scars; Dark marks; Uneven tone
severity_levels: Mild - light pigmentation; Moderate - visible scars; Severe - deep indentations
treatment_approach: Use resurfacing treatments; Microneedling; Retinoids; Brightening serums
key_ingredients: Retinol; Niacinamide; Vitamin C; Centella Asiatica
prevention_tips: Avoid picking pimples; Use sunscreen; Treat acne early

description: Premature aging occurs when external factors accelerate skin aging before its natural time
causes: Sun exposure; Smoking; Stress; Poor diet; Lack of sleep
symptoms: Fine lines; Loss of firmness; Dullness; Uneven tone
severity_levels: Mild - early fine lines; Moderate - visible wrinkles; Severe - sagging
treatment_approach: Use antioxidants; Moisturize daily; Wear SPF; Eat antioxidant-rich foods
key_ingredients: Vitamin C; Retinol; Hyaluronic Acid; CoQ10
prevention_tips: Protect from UV; Manage stress; Eat well; Get enough sleep
